title: Secret Invitation Letter
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>I want to have a sleepover.... with all the first-years.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>We had one with Kasumi-san and Shioriko-san the other day, though.... Do you want to have another one?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>The sleepover with the four of us was a lot of fun. So this time.... I want to have one with all the first-years from μ’s and Aqours too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>That sounds like fun! There are things we can only talk about with other first-years, so I’d love to have one too! Let’s try inviting them.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>How should we invite them? Just send a message....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>That’s fine, but since we’re doing one, how about we make invitations and send them out to everyone? It would be like a secret invitation letter!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>A secret invitation letter.... That seems interesting! Rina-chan’s board「Sparkly Eyes」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Maybe we could also make it in a cipher or something similar....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>A cipher.... that would be so cool! There is software that can make ciphers too.... So I’m sure I can make one that would be hard to break. Leave the cipher to me! Rina-chan’s board「Determined」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>W-, wait! If you go all out on making the cipher, none of us would be able to solve it, Rina-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
